member.name: T:CB.Xaml.XamlHelper
member.summary: Helpers for XAML.

member.name: M:CB.Xaml.XamlHelper.GetChildrenObjects(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary:
CB: Obtains the sub-objects of this control.
Returns null if there is no sub-controls.

member.name: M:CB.Xaml.XamlHelper.GetChildrenControls(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary:
CB: Obtains the sub-controls of this control.
Returns null if there is no sub-controls.

member.name: M:CB.Xaml.XamlHelper.GetRootControl(System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Boolean)
member.summary: CB: Obtains the control at the top or the control tree.
member.param:
If true, checks that all control are loaded.
When a control is not loaded, its Parent is probably null.

member.name: P:CB.Xaml.XamlHelper.IsXamlDesignerRunning
member.summary: Tells if the IDE's Xaml visual designer is running the executing assembly.

member.name: T:CB.Xaml.XamlHelper.XamlRoutedEventHandler`1
member.summary: An event handler for XAML.

member.name: M:CB.Xaml.XamlHelper.Loaded_InterceptAndManageExceptions``1(``0,CB.Xaml.XamlHelper.XamlRoutedEventHandler{``0})
member.summary:
CB: Gets a Loaded event that manages Exceptions even on 64-bit operating systems.
The problem with Loaded event is it does not let catch an exception on 64-bit systems.
If the control is a Window, please consider using ContentRendered instead.
You can consider overriding EndInit too, as it is called after properties initialization by the xaml designer (XDesProc.exe).

member.name: M:CB.Xaml.XamlHelper.TraverseTheControlTree(System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Func{System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.Boolean},System.Boolean)
member.summary: CB: Traverses the entire control tree below this control.
member.param: Returns true to end the travel.

member.name: M:CB.Xaml.XamlHelper.GetControlText(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: CB: Gets the text of this control, whatever type is the control.

member.name: M:CB.Xaml.XamlHelper.GetItemText(System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl,System.Object)
member.summary: CB: Gets the text of this item control/object, whatever type is the control.

member.name: T:CB_Helpers_WPF.Properties.Resources
member.summary: Une classe de ressource fortement typée destinée, entre autres, à la consultation des chaînes localisées.

member.name: P:CB_Helpers_WPF.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Retourne l'instance ResourceManager mise en cache utilisée par cette classe.

member.name: P:CB_Helpers_WPF.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Remplace la propriété CurrentUICulture du thread actuel pour toutes les recherches de ressources à l'aide de cette classe de ressource fortement typée.
